channel.title: Need help with PI
channel.description:
so i got a problem with my PI server and client
when ever i add custom item, i get everything to work and such i spawn it but its invisible u cant see it in inventory or when u drop it or when u equip it i can wear it and i didnt get any problems when compiling
also it when i try to open outfit interface (where is shows armours stats) it crashed my client
what im doing wrong and what can be done to it

item.title: Need help with PI
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“gzikuu, post:1, topic:478384”]so i got a problem with my PI server and client

when ever i add custom item, i get everything to work and such
i spawn it but its invisible
u cant see it in inventory or when u drop it or when u equip it
i can wear it and i didnt get any problems when compiling

also it when i try to open outfit interface (where is shows armours stats) it crashed my client

what im doing wrong and what can be done to it[/quote]
Are you forgetting the models? and the item definitions also.

Read full topic
